name: TITAN GS
tag_list: oracle, consulting, it, bpo, outsourcing, hr, software, tech, information-technology, hosting, cloud, outsource, finance
overview:
<a href="http://ttpartners.com">TITAN GS</a> is a leader in providing turnkey global outsourcing solutions for Finance, HR, and IT built on the Oracle Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) & Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) software platforms. TITAN GS is a pioneer in the Business Process-as-a-Service model, and was recently named a “Cool Vendor” by Gartner.

Whether TITAN GS is acting as an advisor to Executive Management with regard to a key strategic initiative or as an extension of the IT or HR organizations through BPO, we provide platinum-level services in a coordinated, relationship-driven manner.
